p: Adjuvants are substances that act to accelerate, prolong or enhance antigen-specific immune responses when used with specific vaccine antigens. A herbal adjuvant is an agent of natural origin that may stimulate the immune system and increase the response to a vaccine, without having any specific antigenic effect in itself. Adjuvants have been used for decades as important agents for generation of strong immune response to vaccine antigens. Besides generating strong immune response, they also act as immunomodulators by influencing the type and character of antibody generated.
